panels.description: Current FEC statistics as stat panels for quick overview of signal quality issues.
panels.title: FEC Statistics Overview - Critical Issues

panels.description:
A metric is a derived/calculated indicator that detects when SFP power readings might be cached or stale rather than real-time measurements.
What it does:
Detects cached data: When the SFP interface link is DOWN but power readings (RX/TX) are still showing values above -30 dBm
Flags stale readings: Sets value to 1.0 when it detects potentially stale data, 0.0 for fresh data
Helps identify unreliable metrics: Power readings that don't reflect the current link state
panels.title: SFP Data Stale Indicators

panels.description: FEC Error Rate calculation showing the percentage of uncorrectable codewords. Values above 0.1% indicate critical signal quality issues.
panels.title: FEC Error Rate - Critical Signal Quality

panels.description: FEC (Forward Error Correction) statistics showing signal quality issues. High uncorrectable codewords indicate optical signal degradation.
panels.title: FEC Statistics - Signal Quality Issues
